titleInfo.title: Country Spotlight No. 19 featuring Statler Brothers, Ronnie Milsap, Freddie Hart, and Barbara Mandrell at D. H. Conley High School Gym (17624)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Country Spotlight No. 19 featuring Statler Brothers, Ronnie Milsap, Freddie Hart and the Heartbeats, and Barbara Mandrell at D. H. Conley High School Gym on May 14. Poster features metal photoplates of all the acts. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/44132/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
